properties.entry: INSERT INTO DSP ( DSP_NO , MEM_NO , DSP_TITLE , NICKNAME , POST_CTG , ISSUE_DATE , LOCATION_NAME , CASE_PHONE , ANIMAL_VARIETY , ANIMAL_GENDER , ANIMAL_AGE , ANIMAL_WEIGHT , ANIMAL_ISSUE , ETC , MONEY ) VALUES ( 'DSP-'||LPAD(SEQ_DSPNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACH_NO , REF_NO , PATH , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , ATTACH_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , 'DSP-'||LPAD(SEQ_DSPNO.CURRVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT POST_CTG , DSP_TITLE , MONEY , LOCATION_NAME , ANIMAL_ISSUE , PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM DSP JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (DSP_NO = REF_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DSP_NO DESC
